wikipedia_page.main: James Ernest Bond (born 4 May 1929, in Preston) is an English former professional footballer who played as an outside left in the Football League for Manchester United and Carlisle United and in the Scottish League for Queen of the South.Bond played for Leyland Motors before transferring to Manchester United in December 1950, where he helped the club win the 1952 League title. In September 1952, he was transferred to Carlisle United, where he spent seven seasons before moving on to Queen of the South.

response: *Ernie Bond (bushman) (1891–1962), Tasmanian bushman who lived at Gordonvale
